title: Best Innovation Award
overview: Awarded for developing AI-powered code review assistant that reduced review time by 40%.

details.description: Built an intelligent tool using GPT-4 that automatically reviews pull requests and provides actionable feedback. Competed against 50+ teams and won first place for innovation and practical impact.

title: Outstanding Graduate Award
overview: Recognized for academic excellence and contributions to the university community.

details.description: Awarded to one graduating student for exceptional academic performance, research contributions, and leadership in student organizations.

title: Open Source Contributor of the Year
overview: Recognized for significant contributions to open-source projects and community building.

details.description: Contributed 500+ commits to various open-source projects, mentored new contributors, and organized open-source workshops on campus.
